attributes.action: Make December 31st a bank holiday to pay tribute to Covid-19 victims
attributes.additional_details: Many people have lost their loved one's due to the nasty pandemic and urge all leader's around the world to make the 31st of December a public holiday as to when Covid-19 first started
attributes.background: Government to put forward to the rest of the world to make December 31 a holiday.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for public holidays in other countries.

You could start a petition calling for 31st December to be a bank holiday in the UK, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
